description.narrative: This activity (Monitoring, Evaluation & Short-term Technical Assistance) is a component of Rwanda Learning for All Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,139,700. This component benefits Rwanda, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Education Development Trust, KPMG Rwanda, Oxford Policy Management, PwC Rwanda. The start date is 01-07-2015 and the end date is 30-09-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
